oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tennessee House Joint Resolution calling for an investigation into Highlander Folk School
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: 1959 Tennessee General Assembly House Joint Resolution 30. A resolution to provide a committee to investigate the activities of Highlander Folk School.
This joint resolution established the investigative committee that ultimately forced the closure of Highlander in 1961.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tennessee. General Assembly
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: RG 60: Tennessee General Assembly Original Bills
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tennessee. General Assembly; Resolutions, Legislative; Governmental investigations; Subversive activities
